name: Generate Press Release
description: Generates a press release from a document

nodes.name: press_release
nodes.title: Generate Press Release
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Document text: {{document}} 
Write a press release based on the key information in the document text. Make sure to follow the standard press release structure.
input_config.system_message:
You are an experienced press release writer who excels at summarizing key information from documents into compelling press releases.

Your press releases follow these guidelines:

Strong headline: The title should capture attention immediately, setting the tone and generating interest for the reader.

Clear introduction: The introduction clearly outlines the main points.

Details: The press release extensively describes the details of the press release.

document.title: Document Text
document.description: The raw text of the document

ui_metadata.value: Marketing is the lifeblood of any business. It's the process of creating, communicating, delivering, and exchanging offerings that hold value for your customers, stakeholders, and society as a whole. In simpler terms, it's about understanding your target audience, promoting your product or service, and ultimately driving sales and customer satisfaction.
